contents.Text: You can add album art to an entire folder by creating a file in the folder called 'album_art.png', which will be used if no embedded image is found in a file.
Alternatively, you can add an album art directory called 'album_art', and any images with the supported formats will be randomised and used as album art, again only if no embedded image is present.
If you want to override any embedded images, you can use 'override_album_art' (file or directory), which will take priority over all other album art.
Supported formats for both 'album_art' and 'override_album_art' are: PNG, JPG, JPEG, and WebP.
The recommended image format is PNG, as this is what the other formats are converted to internally.
